  • Method Details

    • getQueue

      public Queue getQueue​(java.lang.Long id)
      Fetches the queue with the given id from the database. Throws QueueNotFoundException if there is none
      Parameters:
      id - id of queue to find
      Returns:
      queue with given id

    • getQueueFromCourseId

      public java.lang.Iterable<Queue> getQueueFromCourseId​(java.lang.Long courseID)
      Get list of all queues for a given course
      Parameters:
      courseID - the unique id of the course
      Returns:
      list of matching queues

    • addQueue

      public Queue addQueue​(Queue queue, User user, java.lang.Long courseId, java.lang.Long taskId) throws TaskNotFoundException, CourseNotFoundException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Add given queue to database
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to be added
      user - the user sending the request
      Returns:
      the added queue
      Throws:
      TaskNotFoundException
      CourseNotFoundException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • removeFromQueue

      public void removeFromQueue​(java.lang.Long id, User user)
      Removes a queue spot from the queue. If the caller is a user, it be their own spot they are removing
      Parameters:
      id - id of queue to delete
      user - caller of removal

    • deleteQueue

      public void deleteQueue​(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes the given queue
      Parameters:
      id - id of the queue to delete

    • approveQueue

      public Approved approveQueue​(java.lang.Long id, User assistant)
      Approve the queue and delete it
      Parameters:
      id - id of the queue to approve
      Returns:
      the new approval object
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • assistQueue

      public Queue assistQueue​(java.lang.Long id, User assistant)
      Attach an assistant to a queue
      Parameters:
      id - id of the queue that gets an assistant
      assistant - the assistant to attach
      Returns:
      the edited queue object
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
